typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_ts} as integer,
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as timestamp,
		genre as string,
		id as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as short,
		runtime as short,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as timestamp,
		tier as short,
		title as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> MoviesTitle
source(output(
		MovieRatingSK as integer,
		MovieRatingDescription as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> DimRatings
MoviesTitle select(mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		movieruntimemin = runtime,
		rating
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMovies
Ratings keyGenerate(output(MovieSK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieSK
SelectMovies, DimRatings join(rating == MovieRatingDescription,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Ratings
MovieCategorySK select(mapColumn(
		id,
		title,
		movieruntimemin,
		rating,
		MovieRatingSK,
		MovieRatingDescription,
		MovieSK,
		MovieCategorySK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMoviesCategory
MovieSK keyGenerate(output(MovieCategorySK as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> MovieCategorySK
SelectMoviesCategory derive(MovieSK = toInteger(MovieSK),
		MovieCategorySK = toInteger(MovieCategorySK)) ~> AllColumnsSK
AllColumnsSK sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimMovies
